Title: Relates to violations for concealed license plates
Summary: Adds a knowing element to certain violations for concealed license plates; increases the fine amounts for certain violations relating to concealed license plates to $75 - $300 for first violation, $75 - $350 for a second violation, and $75 - $400 for the third and any subsequent violations.
LawCode: Amd ยง402, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to violations for concealed license plates
